::KitKat::

She heard the message from Megatron.  She forced herself to put on a 
smile. She looked at Drillbit, "They are here, get the troops ready 
and meet us outside. Also, don't forget that fox in the lab."

She walked down the hall, she opened her link, "Destructor, get your 
troops ready, meet me outside the base, we will march on to battle 
soon."

She walked out and met with Megatron. "Glad you could make it. I have 
rooms and provitions for you and your troops if you need it." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron and his followers reached Kitkats shiped, armed and 
looking 
> forward for the fight that lay ahead. Megatron talked into his 
comm, "Kitkat, 
> we are here."
>     
>     Tarantulas turned to Quickstrike, "Detenators will work...." 
and then 
> mumbled under his breath..."so why dont you go strap one to 
yourself." And 
> then looked around the old ship.
